CustomField.formula:
IF( OR( ISPICKVAL( Program__c , "AY"), ISPICKVAL( Program__c , "MLY"),ISPICKVAL( Program__c , "PRW")), "APP",
IF( OR( ISPICKVAL( Program__c , "EXC"), ISPICKVAL( Program__c , "ILS"), ISPICKVAL( Program__c , "ILSH"),ISPICKVAL( Program__c , "ILSU")), "ILS",
IF (ISPICKVAL( Program__c , "LT"),"LT",'')))
CustomField.label: APTS_Product
